Package org.Users.HDBOfficer

Class HDBOfficerManager

java.lang.Object
org.Users.GenericManager<user>
org.Users.HDBOfficer.HDBOfficerManager
public class HDBOfficerManager extends GenericManager<user>
HDBOfficer contains personal information about the manager, their authentication credentials, permission level, and information about their currently assigned project.

    • parseUser

      protected HDBOfficer parseUser(String line)
      Parses a CSV line into an HDBOfficer object. Expected CSV format: userID,username,password,maritalStatus,age,permissionLevel
      Specified by:
      parseUser in class GenericManager<user>
      Parameters:
      line - The CSV line to parse
      Returns:
      A new HDBOfficer object or null if the line cannot be properly parsed

    • toStrList

      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • addUser

      public void addUser(String userID, String username, int age, String maritalStatus, String unused2)
      Adds a new HDB Officer to the system with default values. This method creates a new HDBOfficer with the provided details and a default password of "password". The permission level is set to OFFICER automatically.
      Specified by:
      addUser in class GenericManager<user>
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique ID for the officer
      username - The login username for the officer
      age - The officer's age in years
      maritalStatus - The officer's marital status (or department information)
      unused2 - A parameter that is not used for HDBOfficer creation
